reviewsJson.markdown:
**Rda**/ velocity

**% Used**/ 5

**coil**/ Clapton  **w**/ 45         
  
**Steep time**/ 1 week **wicking**/    full 

**Mouth Feel** - smooth and heavy on the tongue, with no throat hit moderately dense I'd give it a 6 out of 10.          

**Flavor Properties**- rich and sweet with a smooth buttery flavor. Creamy with a hint of vanilla and that fantastic Sweet Bitter cocoa butter flavor.

**Off Flavors** -  a very slight chalky flavor and aftertaste.       

**Position in the recipe** - should be versatile depending on what your pairing with. Doesn't have the punch to be a top note unless you're mixing it who did nothing but cream. Should make a great accent and work well in the base.

**Pairings** - other chocolates and creams    should work well. The whole list of berries and should pair well with most bakeries, and caramel flavorings.
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: White Chocolate
